mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NUM, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, REGDATE, HIT) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents} WHERE NUM=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, REF, STEP, DEPTH) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0)
